summary:
A Craft-able Collection of Standalone Armored Dresses in four color variants using the Wedding dress mesh.
Azure,Forest,Frost and Wine variants.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Grace Darklings Ranger Dress
Version: 2.0
Date: 3/30/2012
Category: Weapons and Armor
Author(s): Grace Darkling

Location
========
Create at the Forge or type into the console \"Help Ranger 4\" without the quotes and use the \"Player.additem <Item Code> 1\" Command.

Details
=======
A Craft-able Collection of Standalone Armored Dresses in four color variants using the Wedding dress mesh.
Azure,Forest,Frost and Wine variants.

Craft-able but not Temper-able as they are supposed to offer \"Light\" protection.

Install
=======
Use NMM or Manual instructions below;
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Incompatibility
===============
None Known.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None Known.

History
=======
1.0, 2012/03/30 - Initial Release.
2.0, 2012/03/30 - Small First Person Fix.

Contact
=======
You can find me on TESNexus as \'Grace Darkling\'

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating TES series.
Thanks to TESNexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

Tools Used
==========
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Photoshop - http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/
TES Construction Set - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=11367
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
Do not upload this onto Steam Workshop.
You are free to use my textures however you want, please give me credit and let me know so I can check out your mod.
author: Grace Darkling
